lead_paragraph: The Pakistani national security adviser said Pakistan feared that India’s growing nuclear cooperation with the United States could harm deterrence efforts in South Asia.
snippet: The Pakistani national security adviser said Pakistan feared that India’s growing nuclear cooperation with the United States could harm deterrence efforts in South Asia.

headline.main: Pakistan Criticizes India’s Inclusion in Nuclear Suppliers Group
